name: Daxue China
overview:
World class quality: Your project is managed from proposal to presentation by professionals with years of market research experience in top corporations and universities. They give careful thought to approach and selection of effective, well-known and proved methodologies to fit your needs, and manage timelines to exacting standards. Our knowledge of research and of China ensure conclusions you can trust.

Nationwide reach: Our unique nationwide network of professional degree candidates (among top MBAs, CPAs, CFAs, PhDs & similar degrees) as well as university professors work with us on a per-project basis to complete large-scale data gathering that even large firms cannot match.

Responsiveness & flexibility: Support from your project manager is just a phone call away. Clients tell us how pleased they are to find their senior consultant had researched their business and understood their unique challenges in China.

Talented people: to perform data collection, we action the excellence of professional degree candidates managed by experienced full-time in-house professionals. They are the brightest of the brightest to collect the data which matters to you.

Our clients: MNC and SME (Small and Medium Entreprises). Our clients are both large multinational firms and medium-sized companies.
